short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for kitchen products
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) wishes to establish Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) for the provision and delivery of several disposable kitchen products and others on an as and when needed basis to all federal departments and ministries located in the Province of Quebec, as detailed in Annex A.
duration_in_months: We estimate the contract will last for 12-18 months
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
**Tender Title:**
E6MON-230001 - 2 - Kitchen Products Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) Contract

**Tender Number:** WS3981001474-Doc4064888418
**Publication Date:** June 27, 2023
**Closing Date:** July 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Contract Overview:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bidders to submit a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the provision and delivery of various disposable kitchen products to federal departments and ministries located in the Province of Quebec.

**Scope of Work:**
The contract covers the supply and delivery of disposable kitchen products, as detailed in Annex A. Vendors will need to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by the closing date.

**Notice Type and Method:**
This is a request for standing offer, using a competitive open bidding method.

**Trade Agreements:**
The contract is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Delivery:**
The contract is delivered in the Quebec province, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contact Information:**
Corine Lavoie (SPAC/PSPC) can be contacted at corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Status:**
The tender is expired, and no further submissions will be considered.

* Be concise in your language and avoid using excessive passive voice constructions.
* Provide clear explanations in your body copy.
* Use lists and bullet points when necessary for clarity.
* Include all relevant information from the original text.
